articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Revolutionary Opera "The Flower Girl"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Revolutionary Opera "The Flower Girl"
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed the revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl" together with workers in the field of metal industry and those of relevant enterprises who participated in the events celebrating May Day.
					 Through the performance the artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe fully demonstrated the great vitality of the revolutionary opera in the DPRK which has made a great contribution to carving out the destiny of the human beings working for independence and to the revolutionary struggle of the popular masses.
					
					 Kim Jong Il highly appreciated the successful performance, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the artistes of the troupe truthfully represented the opera as required by its original work devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm with the same spirit and stamina as they displayed in the days when they brought about a radical turn in operas.
					
					 The new Korean-style operas created in those days are evoking a lively response not only among the Korean people but among the people of many countries for their rich ideological contents and high artistry, he said, adding that it is the great pride of the DPRK to have such ideological, moral, literary and artistic treasure as the "Phibada"-style revolutionary operas.
					
					 He noted that the revolutionary operas of the DPRK including "The Sea of Blood", "The Flower Girl" and "The Story of a Nurse" which have lasting vitality serve as excellent textbooks for class education as they are helpful to the revolutionary education of the younger generation. He underscored the need to intensify the performing activities to let an increasing number of working people, servicepersons and school youth and children watch the operas.
					
					 He set forth tasks to be fulfilled to create art works and conduct performing activities.
					
					 He said that the Korean working class has fully demonstrated their might as ranks of loyalists remaining true to the idea and leadership of the Party and the leader and a revolutionary contingent firmly adhering to the socialist principle from the steadfast anti-imperialist and independent stand through a protracted arduous struggle, stressing that the  DPRK is sure to emerge a victor in the drive for building a thriving nation as the large contingent of such reliable working class is dynamically pushing ahead with the building of an economic power.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Jung Rin and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the WPK Central Committee, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Choe Yong Rim, secretary general of the Presidium of the SPA, Kang Nung Su, minister of Culture, Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, leading officials of the WPK Central Committee, KPA Generals Kim Myong Guk, Hyon Chol Hae, Ri Myong Su and Kim Won Hong and other commanding officers of the army.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand to Develop NAM Clarified
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand to Develop NAM Clarified
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, addressing the ministerial meeting of the Coordinating Committee of the Non-Aligned Movement held in Cuba on April 29, said that the NAM serves as a leading force for ensuring global peace and security and establishing a new fair international order and clarified views on its development.
					 He underscored the need for the member states of the NAM to boost the unity and solidarity in the struggle to protect the sovereignty and give fullest play to the potential of the movement in an effort to increase the capability for intensifying the collective actions in the international arena.
					
					 It is a legitimate right equally granted to all countries to explore outer space and use it for peaceful purposes, he noted, adding that it was a wanton violation of the outer space treaty for the UNSC to have chided the DPRK's just satellite launch for peaceful purposes conducted after going through all the procedures of international law. 
					
					 The situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula proves once again the justice and urgency of the call of the NAM for reforming the anachronistic UNSC which lacks democracy and does not reflect the will of the UN member nations, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The fact that the states participating in the six-party talks were directly or indirectly involved in the unprecedented high-handed practices of the UNSC clearly indicates that the talks have been reduced to a platform for disarming the DPRK and bringing it to its knees. It is the steadfast resolution and stand of the DPRK government that it will not to participate in the talks any more and it will not be bound to any agreement of the talks any longer.
					
					 The DPRK will protect the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula in a responsible manner with the powerful war deterrent built up thanks to the Songun politics of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He expressed the expectation that the member states of the NAM would understand and support the resolution which the DPRK government was compelled to make to defend the sovereignty of the country and remain true to the basic idea of the NAM.
					
					 The DPRK government will creditably fulfil its mission and responsibility to invariably observe and implement the basic principle and idea of the NAM in the future, too, he concluded.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnam Union of Friendship Organizations
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnam Union of Friendship Organizations
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Vietnam Union of Friendship Organizations.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by General Secretary of the union Dao Duy Tien on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Suppression of Pro-Reunification Movement Organization under Fire
articles.content:
Suppression of Pro-Reunification Movement Organization under Fire
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Side Committee for Implementation of the June 15 Joint Declaration in a statement on May 1 bitterly denounced the Lee Myung Bak group's suppression of pro-reunification movement organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration as an open negation of the inter-Korean joint declarations and an unpardonable anti-reunification criminal act to stamp out the reunification movement in south Korea.
					 Through this suppression the group of traitors revealed once again their true intention before the world to suppress social democracy and totally stamp out the reunification movement by following in the footsteps of the past fascist dictators and, at the same time, stand against fellow countrymen to the last, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It is the Lee group in south Korea keen on sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with compatriots under the signboard of "pragmatism" that deserve a stern punishment of the nation for bringing grist to the mill of the enemy. 
					
					 All Koreans will surely force traitor Lee Myung Bak to pay for the crimes committed against the nation.
					
					 The people from all walks of life in south Korea should turn out as one in the just patriotic struggle to resolutely check the Lee group's moves for confrontation with compatriots and war, get the "National Security Law", fascist law against the nation, abolished and achieve independence and democracy of the society under the uplifted banner of the inter-Korean joint declaration.
					
					 We call upon all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to wage a more dynamic mass struggle to check the Lee group's brutal fascist suppression of pro-reunification democratic forces of different circles of south Korea including the above-said solidarity.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Move for Inter-Korean Broadcasting Exchange Termed Hypocritical
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Move for Inter-Korean Broadcasting Exchange Termed Hypocritical 
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The "Broadcasting and Communication Committee" of south Korea at a recent plenary meeting decided to form a "committee for promoting south-north broadcasting exchange" allegedly for the purpose of "systematically promoting the exchange and cooperation in the field of broadcasting between the south and the north".
					 A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea answered the question raised by KCNA in this regard on May 2.
					
					 This is a mockery and deception of the public opinion and the mind-set of the people at home and abroad desirous of national concord and reunification and true cooperation and exchange between media of the north and the south, the spokesman said, and continued: 
					
					 The cooperation and exchange between the media that are keenly aware of the disgrace and sufferings resulting from the national split that has lasted for more than half a century should duly serve the purpose of national unity and reunification. But those progressive media that speak for justice and truth and call for reunification and patriotism have become the targets of merciless fascist suppression in south Korea today whereas the conservative media hell-bent on flunkeyism, treachery, fascist actions and anti- reunification acts are growing influential under the patronage of the authorities. 
					
					 It is none other than the "Broadcasting and Communication Committee" that is spearheading the moves to embellish the group of traitors' confrontation with fellow countrymen and anti- reunification policy and the moves of the authorities to turn the media conservative and reptile.
					
					 The decision of the above-said committee was prompted by the sinister intention of the group to cover up its anti-reunification and confrontational true colors, calm down the people of all strata criticizing and condemning it and put under its full control the exchange and cooperation under way between progressive media institutions of south Korea and media organs in the north. 
					
					 The committee which was formed by traitor Lee Myung Bak to control media in March should be disorganized without delay as demanded by the people of various strata as it is a government-controlled unpopular and reactionary mechanism taking the lead in enforcing the fascist rule of the group.

articles.title: 12th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair to Be Held
articles.content:
12th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair to Be Held
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The 12th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair will be held at the Three-Revolution Exhibition from May 11 to 14. 
					 The fair will bring together companies of the DPRK, China, Russia, Germany, Malaysia, Syria, Sweden, Singapore, Australia,  Austria, UK, Italy, Indonesia, Vietnam, Thailand, France, Turkey and Taipei of China. 
					
					 On display will be machine tools, electric and electronic products, vehicles, petrochemicals, medicines, daily necessities, foodstuffs, etc.

articles.title: Buddhist Masses Held at Temples across Country
articles.content:
Buddhist Masses Held at Temples across Country
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The "celebration of the birthday of Buddha, 2553 Buddhist Era and the north-south simultaneous Buddhist masses praying for the country's reunification" simultaneously took place at temples across the country on Saturday. 
					 Present there were office-bearers of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea and its provincial, city and county committees, priests and monks of temples and believers. 
					
					 Rituals were made to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that they are significantly celebrating the birthday of Buddha, 2553 Buddhist Era at the stirring time when all the people turned out as one in the last charge of building a great prosperous and powerful nation with the great national pride of having successfully launched the satellite. They called upon the Buddhists to make tangible contributions to building a great prosperous and powerful nation through substantial participation in various activities. 
					
					 The inter-Korean relations that had developed on good terms after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration have reached the brink of a war owing to the persistent sycophancy toward the U.S. and the moves for confrontation with the north on the part of the present conservative ruling forces of south Korea, they noted.
					
					 They called upon all the Buddhists in the north and the south and abroad to unite in Dharma-minded concord and foil the Lee Myung Bak group's moves for a war and thoroughly preserve and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, its practical programme, and thus make substantial contributions to accelerating the country's reunification. 
					
					 A joint prayer for the country's reunification carrying the unanimous desire of all the Buddhists in the north and the south was read out at the masses.

articles.title: Research Achievements in Mariculture
articles.content:
Research Achievements in Mariculture
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Microbiological Institute under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK has made successes in the researches into mariculture recently.
					 Scientists of the institute have succeeded in separating various kinds of one-cell sea algae with high nutrition and establishing the technology of preserving their pure breed and mass-culture in the sea water areas of the country.
					
					 The successes were registered in the course of research to solve the problem of basic fodder of sea animals.
					
					 They also successfully applied this technology to artificial cultivation of the sea animals such as sea cucumber, short neck clam and puffer.
					
					 They developed and introduced a new fodder additive needed for breeding fish.
					
					 Feeding fish on the by-products of sea weeds and fodder processed and treated with microorganism additive makes it possible to prevent the mass-death of fry and increase their survival and weight increment rate.
					
					 They also developed a new fodder additive by microbiological method. It contains the nutritive elements like natural ones with which the fry hatch out from the egg.
					
					 The achievements pay off profusely in various units.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace of the DPRK is a centre of extracurricular education for youth and schoolchildren.
					 The palace, founded in May Juche 78 (1989), is permeated with warm love of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent lots of education and edification facilities and took all measures for strengthening the material and technological foundation of the palace, saying that there is nothing to spare for the children. 
					
					 The palace, with an area of 300,000 square meters, has a science building, an art building, a gymnasium, a swimming pool, a 2,000-seat modern theater and the like.
					
					 It has brought up lots of schoolchildren as able reserves of special fields over last two decades.
					
					 It produced more than 20 winners of special prizes and gold medals in international contests and hundreds of sports reserves to make a contribution to the sports development of the country.
					
					 The Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Art Troupe formed by art circle members of the palace made successful performance tours of many countries such as China, Russia, France and Malaysia.
					
					 Over 5,000 schoolchildren take part in extracurricular activities in the palace every day to grow up as pillars of the country.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Eternal Leader of Humankind
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Eternal Leader of Humankind
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Reverence for President Kim Il Sung, eternal leader of the humankind's cause of independence is growing ever higher among the world progressive people as the days go by.
					In his lifetime, he visited 87 countries on 54 occasions and received more than 70,000 foreigners including over 400 heads of party, state and government to give clear-cut answers to all important political, economic and other problems raised by the times.
					
					 Charmed by his outstanding ideology, theory and personality, foreigners have boundlessly revered him, looking up to him.
					
					 This year, too, preparatory committees for commemorating the Day of the Sun were formed in many countries such as Russia, Britain, Pakistan, Ecuador, Mexico, South Africa and Italy and retrospective meetings, rallies, lectures, film shows, seminars, photo exhibitions and other political and cultural functions were held on the occasion.
					
					 At the joint meeting of the International Institute of Juche Idea, the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea and organizations for the study of the Juche Idea in India, the participants lauded President Kim Il Sung as outstanding leader of the 20th century and his idea on self-reliance and independence as the beacon of the entire humankind aspiring after equality, freedom and justice.
					
					 Preparations for commemorating his 100th birth anniversary as the most significant holiday in human history are being made in a brisk way.
					
					 In January last year the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association called upon the organizations of friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in various countries to organize preparatory committees for significantly greeting his 100th birth anniversary and to auspiciously commemorate the Day of the Sun in 2012.
					
					 In response to the appeal, the Nordic Cooperation Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People and the friendship and solidarity organizations in Norway, Finland, Sweden, Denmark and Switzerland formed the Nordic preparatory committee to commemorate the 100th birth anniversary. Similar committees have been organized one after another in Germany, Czech Republic, Tanzania and other countries.
					
					 The participants in the inaugural meetings said in unison that to commemorate the Day of the Sun splendidly as a holiday common to the humankind is their firm will to shine his idea and exploits and to hold him as the eternal leader of the humankind's cause of independence.
					
					 Over last eight years since the first preparatory committee to commemorate the Day of the Sun was formed in Poland in January 2001 various preparatory committees including special preparatory committee, national preparatory committee and nation-wide preparatory committee were formed in 60-odd countries and international and regional organizations on over 400 occasions.
					
					The preparatory committees held meetings, seminars, film shows, photo exhibitions and other political and cultural activities on more than 3,000 occasions over the last years.

articles.title: Puppet Traitor Urged to Apologize for Killing Evacuees
articles.content:
Puppet Traitor Urged to Apologize for Killing Evacuees
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The All-People Committee for the Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on April 28 to demand traitor Lee Myung Bak make apology for the killing of evacuees.
					 At the conference the organization accused the Lee "government" of taking no measures to settle the tragedy in Ryongsan for nearly a hundred days after it. 
					
					 The present "government" is resorting to despicable moves to build up public opinion for falsifying and covering up the truth about the tragedy, the organization held, terming this an act to gloss over the murder case.
					
					 The truth about the Ryongsan tragedy has not been probed nor has the demand for punishing the prime mover of the killing been met due to the Lee regime's moves to evade its responsibility, it charged, stressing:
					
					 If the situation is to be properly settled it is necessary for Lee Myung Bak to kneel down and make apology before the people before anything else.

articles.title: "Presidential Statement" of UNSC Critical of DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
"Presidential Statement" of UNSC Critical of DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi political figures denounced a "presidential statement" of the UNSC critical of the DPRK's satellite launch.
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, asserted in a statement released on April 23 that the DPRK has a legal right and qualification to launch anytime a satellite for such peaceful purposes as study and use of space.
					
					 Noting that the UNSC which has been reduced to a puppet of the U.S. imperialists does not hesitate to perpetrate dastardly acts, he added that the adoption of its "presidential statement" is aimed at forcing the DPRK to bring to its knees. 
					
					 He stressed that the DPRK was entirely just when it decided not to take part in the six-party talks which seriously infringed upon its sovereignty.
					
					 Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, in a statement issued on April 24, bitterly denounced the UNSC for releasing the brigandish "presidential statement" critical of the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes which was legitimately conducted after going through international legal procedures.
					
					 By issuing the above-said statement the UNSC once again revealed that it is nothing but a mere tool of meekly accepting the U.S. brigandish demand and meeting it, he held. 
					
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, in a statement released on the same day said the DPRK's satellite launch is a sovereign right, declaring that it would extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle in the future, too.

articles.title: KPA Praised by Romanian Party Leader
articles.content:
KPA Praised by Romanian Party Leader
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania who is chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, released a statement titled "Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il and Korean People's Army" on April 23 on the occasion of the 77th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 He said in the statement that the KPA has demonstrated its might as a reliable guardian of the socialist cause, meeting the challenge of the imperialists under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The statement noted that Kim Jong Il has always paid primary attention to the political and ideological preparations of the army and indicated orientations and ways for the political and ideological work as required by the situation in every period, training the KPA as an army strong in ideology and faith.
					
					 The KPA has also been developed into matchless ranks fully equipped with modern military technology, the statement stressed, and continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has attached great importance to augmenting the military and technological might of the People's Army since long ago and firmly armed the People's Army with unique strategy and tactics as required by the characteristics of modern warfare and the tense situation under the uplifted banner of Songun in the closing years of the last century, in particular.
					
					 As a result, the KPA has grown to be a powerful army equipped with ultra-modern science and technology which no one dare attack. 
					
					 The KPA led by Kim Jong Il will win one victory after another as a matchless army.

articles.title: DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place in Britain on April 18 on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 77th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of the Songun Policy, and Shawn Pikford, its member, and other speakers said that Kim Il Sung who devoted his all to the happiness of the people and the prosperity of the country all his life is alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind and the exploits performed by him for the cause of global independence will be immortal.
					
					 They explained and proved the originality and vitality of the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by the President, adding that the DPRK's recent successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 demonstrated its level of Juche-oriented scientific and technological development and dealt a telling blow at the reactionary forces including the U.S. imperialists to monopolize space.
					
					 The KPA demonstrating its invincible might under the leadership of the outstanding Songun brilliant commander gives the world progressive people great hope and confidence, they stressed.
					
					 A seminar was held in France on April 21 on the occasion of the Army Day of the DPRK.
					
					 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, in a report recalled that Kim Il Sung, founder of the immortal Juche idea and the Songun idea, accomplished a historic cause. 
					
					Saying that the Songun idea of Kim Il Sung has been successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he added that the DPRK is sure to win thanks to the unshakable faith of Kim Jong Il to bring to final completion the Korean revolution with arms which was started and advanced with arms.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar held in France.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion de festejo del Primero de May
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion de festejo del Primero de Mayo
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Primero de Mayo, Dia Internacional de los Trabajadores de todo el mundo, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la vispera junto con los obreros de la rama de industria metalurgica y las empresas vinculadas la funcion de festejo del Coro Estatal Benemerito.
					  Cuando el Dirigente aparecio en el palco, los obreros del Complejo de Acero Chollima, el Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae, el Complejo Carbonifero de la Region de Anju y las Minas de Jaeryong y de Unryul lo acogieron con entusiasmo.
					
					  El Dirigente dio calidas felicitaciones a los obreros, que celebran el Primero de Mayo, respondiendo cordialmente al saludo de ellos.
					
					  El Coro Estatal Benemerito interpreto en esta ocasion los coros masculinos "Nuestro camarada Kim Jong Il", "Trotes en el Paektu" y "Mayo de triunfo", los solos y coros masculinos "Deseo del combatiente" y "Hemos comenzado de la nada", la musica orquestal y coro masculino "Arreboles en Kangson", los solos y coros masculinos "Marcharemos llenos de seguridad" y "Cancion de la camaraderia", los coros masculinos "!Que prospere la epoca del Partido del Trabajo", "Primero de Mayo" y "Camino a la victoria" y otras piezas.
					
					  A traves del espectaculo, los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico  la orgullosa trayectoria de la revolucion coreana coronada con victorias y glorias y demostraron la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de llevar a feliz termino sin falta la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de construccion de una gran potencia prospera bajo la bandera del Songun (priorizacion militar) superando cualesquier dificultades y pruebas.
					
					  El Dirigente saludo repetida y sinceramente a los espectadores que le aclamaban apasionadamente y expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que ellos cumpliran magnificamente el papel de vanguardia en la gran batalla para la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los artistas del referido conjunto artistico ofrecieron esta excelente funcion en que palpitan la conviccion y la voluntad de Corea y el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y evaluo altamente los exitos logrados por ellos en la ocasion.
					
					  Le acompanaron el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares Kim Yong Chun, el jefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea Ri Yong Ho, los secretarios del CC del PTC Choe Thae Bok, Kim Jung Rin y Kim Ki Nam, el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema Yang Hyong Sop, el primer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores Kang Sok Ju, los jefes, los primeros subjefes y otros cuadros del CC del PTC, los generales de ejercito del EPC Kim Myong Guk, Hyon Chol Hae, Ri Myong Su y Kim Won Hong, y otros comandantes del ejercito.

articles.title: RPDC se esforzara por el desarrollo de MNOAL, afirma canciller coreano
articles.content:
RPDC se esforzara por el desarrollo de MNOAL, afirma canciller coreano
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ATCC) -- Al hacer uso de la palabra el 29 de abril en la reunion ministerial del comite coordinador del Movimiento de los No Alineados (MNOAL) sesionada en Cuba, el canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun dijo que hoy dia, este movimiento constituye la fuerza protagonica para preservar la paz y la seguridad del mundo y establecer un nuevo e imparcial orden internacional, y expuso sus puntos de vista para fortalecerlo y desarrollarlo.
					  Los paises miembros del MNOAL deben fortalecer la unidad y solidaridad en la lucha por defender la soberania y elevar notablemente la capacidad de accion colectiva en los escenarios internacionales al emplear al maximo la potencialidad del movimiento, subrayo el canciller.
					
					  Explotar el cosmos y usarlo para fines pacificos devienen un derecho legitimo concedido por igual a todos los paises, asevero.
					
					Al condenar el lanzamiento de satelite para fines pacificos realizado justamente por la RPDC pasando por todos los tramites requeridos por el derecho internacional, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU cometio una flagrante violacion del tratado del espacio, destaco. 
					
					  La situacion creada hoy en la Peninsula Coreana  vuelve a demostrar cuan justa y apremiante es la demanda del MNOAL de reformar el anacronico Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que no tiene democracia ni refleja la voluntad general de los paises miembros de la ONU, dijo.
					
					  La participacion directa o indirecta de los paises participantes en las conversaciones a 6 bandas en esa arbitrariedad sin precedente del CS demuestra claramente que este dialogo se convirtio en el espacio para desarmar y doblegar a la RPDC, acoto.
					
					  El gobierno coreano mantiene  su inconmovible decision de no volver jamas a las conversaciones a 6 bandas ni comprometerse a ningun acuerdo alcanzado en ellas, asevero.
					
					  La paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana las defenderemos con responsabilidad con el poderoso disuasivo de guerra preparado en virtud de la politica de Songun (priorizacion militar) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, ratifico
					
					  Expreso la esperanza de que todos los miembros del MNOAL entiendan y apoyen esa decision tomada inevitablemente por el gobierno coreano para defender la soberania del pais y el ideal fundamental del MNOAL.
					
					  En el futuro tambien, el gobierno coreano cumplira con toda su mision y responsabilidad para mantener y materializar invariablemente el principio e ideal fundamentales del MNOAL, concluyo.

articles.title: Vocero de la UPC condena artimana de la banda de Lee Myong Bak
articles.content:
Vocero de la UPC condena artimana de la banda de Lee Myong Bak
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ATCC) -- Al responder a la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea formulada el dia 2 en relacion con que en una reciente "asamblea general" el "Comite de Radio y Comunicacion" del Sur de Corea decidio componer el "comite por la promocion del intercambio de radiodifusion Sur-Norte" para "promover sistematicamente el intercambio y la cooperacion del dominio de radio entre el Sur y el Norte" el vocero del CC de la Union de Periodistas de Corea dijo:
					  Esto deviene la burla y el engano a la opinion publica interna y externa y la voluntad del pueblo que desean la reconciliacion y la reunificacion de la nacion y aspiran la cooperacion y el intercambio sinceros entre los medios de prensa del Norte y el Sur.
					
					  La cooperacion y el intercambio entre los circulos de prensa del Norte y el Sur que  experimentaban profundamente durante mas de un medio siglo la verguenza y los sufrimientos de la division nacional deben ser usados debidamente  como medios para la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					  Pero, hoy en dia, en el Sur de Corea los medios de prensa progresistas que hablan de la justicia y la verdad e insisten en la reunificacion y patriotismo  son objeto de la despiadada represion fascista y al contrario, los medios de la prensa conservadores enloquecidos por el servilismo a las grandes potencias y la vendepatria, el fascismo y la anti-reunificacion desempenan el rol de duenos bajo el abrigo de las autoridades.
					
					  El comite en cuestion se pone en la delantera de las maniobras para justificar la confrontacion fratricida y la politica anti-reunificacion de la banda de  traidores y convertir los medios de prensa en las fuerzas conservadoras y los medios venales.
					
					  Por tanto, la decision del citado comite no es nada mas que un malsano intento de la banda de Lee para  encubrir su naturaleza anti-reunificacion y conflictiva, mitigar la censura y denuncia de los habitantes de distintos sectores y controlar todas las  labores de intercambio y cooperacion entre las progresistas entidades de prensa del Sur y el Norte de Corea.
					
					  El "Comite de Radio y Comunicacion", organo de control de medios de prensa fabricado en marzo del ano pasado por el traidor Lee deviene el aparato venal antipopular y reaccionario que realiza en la delantera la dominacion fascista de la banda traidora.
					
					Por tanto, tal comite debe ser disuelto cuanto antes de acuerdo con la demanda de los habitantes de distintos sectores.

articles.title: Actos budistas en distintos templos
articles.content:
Actos budistas en distintos templos
						
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar  a la vez el dia 2 en los templos de distintas localidades de Corea los actos budistas por el Dia de Nacimiento de Buda en el ano 2553 de la Era Budista y la reunificacion de la patria".
					En los actos participaron los clerigos del Comite Central de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea y de los comites provinciales, urbanos y distritales de esta entidad, los monjes-jefes, los monjes y los creyentes de los respectivos templos.
					
					En las ocasiones se efectuaron las ceremonias y hubo discursos.
					
					Cuando todo el pueblo coreano, lleno del gran orgullo nacional de lanzar exitosamente el satelite artificial de la tierra, se levanto unanimemente en la  ofensiva general por la construccion de la gran potencia prospera se conmemora significativamente el Dia del Nacimiento de Buda en 2553 de la Era Budista, dijeron los oradores y enfatizaron que tambien los budistas deben acercarse con varias actividades a esta realidad para hacer contribucion especifica a la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Debido a las persistentes maniobras serviles a  EE.UU. y de enfrentamiento con el Norte de Corea  a que recurren las actuales fuerzas conservadoras del Sur de Corea, las  relaciones Norte-Sur que han venido desarrollandose favorablemente despues de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio se pusieron en el estado peor en que puede estallar en cualquier momento la guerra, dijeron.
					
					Llamaron a todos los budistas en el Norte y el Sur de Corea y ultramar a unirse firmemente para frustrar las maniobras belicas de la banda de Lee Myung Bak, ejecutar estrictamente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre que es el programa practico de la primera, y  a levantarse activamente en la lucha por lograr lo mas pronto posible la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					En los actos simultaneos se dieron lectura a los discursos comunes por la reunificacion de la patria que reflejan el unanime deseo de todos los budistas del Norte y el Sur.
